verses.name: 2 Chronicles 24:12
verses.text: And the king and Jehoiada gave it to such as did the work of the service of the house of the Lord, and hired masons and carpenters to repair the house of the Lord, and also such as wrought iron and brass to mend the house of the Lord.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 24:13
verses.text: So the workmen wrought, and the work was perfected by them, and they set the house of God in his state, and strengthened it.
